channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are we in a recession? Maybe professional Santas can tell us
item.description: Demand for professional Santas and other seasonal workers seems to have cooled. Could that be a sign we're in a recession?

item.title: Black bear populations are bouncing back. Here's how these Texas towns are coping
item.description: Historically, Black bears were the biggest predator to travel the Big Bend area of Texas. But overhunting and habitat loss led to their decline.
